name: Hexis (carllacan)
description:
Hexis is a game about moving groups of hexagons around and placing them in the right places. It's easy when you only have to deal with one piece, but sometimes many pieces appear simultaneously and you'll have to hurry up to lead them where they fit.

Reasons to play Hexis:

  •     It has hexagons, which are the best kind of polygon.
  •     Forget for a while about the mess your life is and find solace in being able to create some order, somewhere.
  •     Discover it's actually harder than it looks, but now you're invested and need to get it right. Like, are you going to suck at this too?
  •     Watch as even this simple game becomes another chaotic scramble for survival.
  •     At least it's nice to look at, unlike the problems in your life.

 You'll go from satisfyingly stacking the shapes with each other to panickly placing them where they do least harm.
